'''''Ever an Outcast in the Forest''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to confront [[Trofin Snezhevich]] in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Bad Guy in Vimara Village]]''.
